author: Special Correspondent
text: Forest Department officials on Wednesday conducted a training session for volunteers who will assist the department to conduct a wildlife census in The Nilgiris North and South Forest Divisions from March 3. WWF, and OSAI are some of the NGOs who have joined hands with the department in carrying out the census. Students of the Government Arts College attended the programme conducted by Divisional Forest Officer C. Badrasamy.
title: Training programme held
